title: Ep 358 | Why ‘Church Hurt’ Is a Problem That Many People Encounter & Why We Shouldn’t Disown God
description:
Jase gives a speech in the former raccoon capital of the world, and Al remembers the time he spoke in Intercourse, Pennsylvania. Zach shares his experience with “church hurt” and how it shaped his spiritual journey. Jase and Zach explain the importance of grace for a listener’s wife who struggles with her faith. Phil highlights the importance of gathering with likeminded people to grow your faith. And Jase discusses one crucial reason we should never disown God.
